/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees and shrubs on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
